verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: For one afternoon] [ARGM-DIS: at least] , [ARG1: Deputy U.S. Attorney General Rod Rosenstein] [V: went] [ARG3: from being President Donald Trump ’s Twitter target] [ARG4: to being the administration ’s Supreme Court mouthpiece] .
